trans-unit.source:
Size
Choose the size of the button.
(Default: Normal)

Color
Choose the color of all the buttons. The colors have been predefined from the programmer.
(Attenstion: If you define a color here, then you can not define a color for each element individually. If you want diffferent colors for the buttons, define it directly on the button settngs.)

Stacked
Choose whether the buttons should align vertically:
Options:
  • Stacked for all screens: From mobile until no end, the buttons will be align vertically.
  • Stacked for mobile: The buttons be align vertically only on mobile.
  • Stacked for mobile: From mobile until tablet, the buttons will be align vertically.

      • If nothing is chosen, then the buttons will not be vertically aligned

Expanded
If you activate this option then the buttons will be equaly split and take the complete width of their container.

Container
If you activate this option, then the button group will get the grid-container wrapped around it.

Position
Positioning will only be activated if the container option is active.
Options:
  • Align center: The button will be aligned to the center.
  • Align center: The button will be aligned to the right.

      • If nothing is chosen, then the button will be aligned to the left.
